mil.nga.giat.geowave.vector.query.row

Class CountThresholdRowIdStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.vector.query.row.BasicRowIdStore
      • mil.nga.giat.geowave.vector.query.row.CountThresholdRowIdStore

  • public class CountThresholdRowIdStore
extends BasicRowIdStore
    This extends the concept of the BasicRowIdStore which tracks painted pixels and their mapping to row IDs, but it only marks a pixel (or cell of pixels) as 'painted' once it has exceeded a threshold number of times rendered.

    • Field Summary
